com.redhat.rhn.domain.user
Class UserFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.redhat.rhn.common.hibernate.HibernateFactory
      com.redhat.rhn.domain.user.UserFactory

public class UserFactory
extends HibernateFactory

UserFactory - the singleton class used to fetch and store com.redhat.rhn.domain.user.User objects from the database.

lookupByIds

public static java.util.List lookupByIds(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> ids)
Get users by their ids. If the incoming list has more than 1000 entries, we'll chop it up and run several queries, re-assembling the results in application code. This is to accommodate Oracle's ORA-01795 error "maximum number of expressions in a list is 1000".

Parameters:
ids - the ids to lookup for
Returns:
the list of com.redhat.rhn.domain.User objects found

satelliteHasUsers

public static boolean satelliteHasUsers()
Method to determine whether a satellite has any users. Returns true if satellite has one or more users, false otherwise. Also returns false if this method is called on a hosted installation.

Returns:
true if satellite has one or more users, false otherwise.
